verses.name: Matthew 25:40
verses.text: And the King shall answer and say unto them, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.

verses.name: Matthew 25:41
verses.text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand, Depart from me, ye cursed, into everlasting fire, prepared for the devil and his angels:

verses.name: Matthew 25:42
verses.text: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me no meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me no drink:
